column3: birth-1-2 mon after 1st dose-8 weeks after 2nd dose & 16 weeks after 1st dose
2 months after birth-4 months after birth-6 month after birth-15-18 months after birth-4-6 years(not necessary if dose 4 was administered at age 4 years or older)
2 months after birth-4 months after birth-4-dose series: 6 month after birth; 3-dose series: 12-15 months after birth-4-dose series: 12-15 months after birth
12-15 months after birth-4-6 years after birth( may be administered as early as 4 weeks after 1st dose)
2 months after birth-4 months after birth-6-18 months after birth-4-6 years (administer the final dose on or after the 4th birthday and at least 6 months after the previous dose)
12-15 months after birth-4-6 years after birth( may be administered as early as 3 months after dose 1)
11-12 years after birth-16 years after birth
